title: Just in time for the New Year.
content:
Did you forget someone this christmas?

Did you get something you didn't want this christmas?

Now you can give the gift of Euri, imagine the looks you'll get walking down the streets of Paris, all the Italians will stop and kiss you, saying 'per Bacco! where did you finda that hoodie?

You've seen him on Channel 4 now you can have one of your very own. That fun loving Euro T-shirts are here.

Show your friends you're not a stuffy old anorak.

[http://www.spreadshirt.net/shop.php?sid=200098](http://web.archive.org/web/20121102080526/http:/www.spreadshirt.net/shop.php?sid=200098 "http://www.spreadshirt.net/shop.php?sid=200098")

Merry Christmas from Euri the Euro

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121102080526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eurilogo_banner_4179.jpg)
author: vinceconnare

comments.content:
That link requires a login  
Tim

sorry it must give you comic cookies so I hope I fixed it..  
Sono spiacente

Hey Vince – Did you see Comic Sans featured on one of the questions of 'University Challenge' on Monday night? a four-part Type ID! – Courier, Impact, Garamond and Comic Sans. The team got them all right.

Nick Cooke

Nick, that was such a tough question to ask them, almost sadistic :-)

ChrisL
